page.title: 02Sellindge,buildings 1952-85.
page.content: In the village in the 1950's there were mostly shops and houses and the population was about 900.Now the village has been taken over by new buildings and homes and the population is around 2000.Swan Lane had no pathway there were only a few cottage near the A20 end and Brook Lane cottages stood alone in the country side.Now there are many new homes and shops which cover land that probably used to be used for crops or grazing land.The bus service used to be every 20 minutes instead of hourly like today.Our school has not changed very much though there used to be a school house where the headmaster lived.On the garage site there was a forge a printing press and a sweet shop.Silver Spray was a garden nursery.
